New Records: Sese Bau became the second Papua New Guinea batter to hit a fifty in the T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Sese Bau played a fine knock of 50 runs against co-hosts West Indies
Assad Vala dismissed by Akeal Hosein
Romario Shepherd claimed the wicket of Tony Ura
Pre-Game Insights: WI captain Rovman Powell won the toss and chose to bowl vs Papua New Guinea
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies' pace and spin combination led to an early collapse for Papua New Guinea
